rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;b54b0762.1502">   <title>Copac downtime - maintenance on 26 February 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;b54b0762.1502</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br><br>This is to let you know that Copac will be unavailable from 8am on the morning of Thursday, 26 February whilst local network maintenance is carried out.<br><br>The downtime is only expected to last for 5-10 minutes, but the service should be considered at risk that morning.<br><br>Please accept our apologies for the short notice and inconvenience. If you have any comments or questions please get in touch via the Copac helpdesk: copac@mimas.ac.uk [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-19T15:11:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;b54b0762.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;4c79fa08.1501">   <title>Copac update: Library of Queen's University Belfast loaded </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;4c79fa08.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>We're pleased to announce that the holdings of Queen's University Belfast Library http://www.qub.ac.uk/directorates/InformationServices/TheLibrary/ have been added to Copac.<br><br>Queen's University Library has extensive collections covering the arts, humanities, social sciences, science and engineering. The Library provides access to a wide range of services in support of each subject holding more than 1.5 million books and journals as well as providing access to an extensive range of electronic resources. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-12T11:38:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;4c79fa08.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;5f860de.1412">   <title>Copac - Season's Greetings and Christmas Closure </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;5f860de.1412</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year from the Copac team!<br><br>The Copac office will be closed from the 23 December and will re-open on the 5th January.<br><br>The Copac database service will be available over Christmas and New Year, but there will be no helpdesk support. Any queries sent over this period will be dealt with when we return. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-23T14:06:47+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;5f860de.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;db54e564.1411">   <title>Copac downtime - maintenance on 2 December 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;db54e564.1411</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br><br>This is to let you know that Copac will be unavailable from around 9am on the morning of Tuesday, 2 December whilst system maintenance is carried out.<br><br>We don't know exactly how long this work will take but the service should be considered at risk until 12 noon.<br><br>Please accept our apologies for the short notice and inconvenience. If you have any comments or questions please get in touch via the Copac helpdesk: copac@mimas.ac.uk [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-26T16:36:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;db54e564.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;5c12289c.1411">   <title>Copac is available again </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;5c12289c.1411</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br><br>Just to update you, the network problem has been resolved and the Copac service is available again.<br><br>Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused. Access should be back to normal but please let us know if you have any problems or queries.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Jane<br><br>Jane Ronson<br>Copac Service<br>Mimas, Jisc<br><br>E: copac@mimas.ac.uk<br>W: http://copac.ac.uk<br>Twitter: @copac    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T13:25:54+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;5c12289c.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;7be16b75.1411">   <title>Copac service is currently unavailable </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;7be16b75.1411</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br><br>Apologies, the Copac service is currently unavailable due to a University of Manchester network problem. This is being investigated urgently and we will update you again as soon as possible.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Jane<br><br>Jane Ronson<br>Copac Service<br>Mimas, Jisc<br><br>E: copac@mimas.ac.uk&lt;mailto:copac@mimas.ac.uk&gt;<br>W: http://copac.ac.uk<br>Twitter: @copac    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-12T09:25:42+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;7be16b75.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;118aaa3c.1409">   <title>York University Library catalogue reloaded on to Copac </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;118aaa3c.1409</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>We are pleased to confirm that the York University Library catalogue (including the National Railway Museum and York Minster) has now been reloaded onto Copac.<br><br>To browse, or limit your search to the holdings of the York University Library, go to the main tab on copac.ac.uk and choose 'York University' from the list of libraries. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-15T15:01:15+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;118aaa3c.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;d7e8e315.1408">   <title>Copac team office move </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;d7e8e315.1408</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>We are moving offices! Telephone numbers remain the same but contact may unavailable Friday/Monday. Email should be unaffected and we'll reply as soon as we can.<br>Our new address is:<br><br>Copac, Jisc<br>J Floor, Sackville Street Building<br>The University of Manchester<br>Sackville Street<br>Manchester<br>M1 3BB<br><br>Thanks for bearing with us!<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Jane<br><br>Jane Ronson<br>Development and Outreach Officer<br>Copac Service<br>Mimas [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-01T08:48:17+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;d7e8e315.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;958e567e.1407">   <title>Copac database is available again </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;958e567e.1407</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>The Copac database is now available again. You'll notice a few changes - please see our (updated) blog post 'New Copac database and revised interface' for details: http://copac.ac.uk/blog/2014/07/new-copac-database-and-revised-interface/.<br><br>Do let us know of any problems by emailing copac@mimas.ac.uk.<br><br>Thank you.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Jane<br><br>Jane Ronson<br>Development and Outreach Officer<br>Copac Service<br>Mimas<br><br>T: +44 (0) 161 275 6789<br>E: copac@mimas.ac.uk<br>W: Copac: http://copac.ac.uk<br>Twitter: @copac    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-30T12:58:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;958e567e.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;88135833.1407">   <title>Copac database moving today </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;88135833.1407</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>The Copac database will be moved as soon as possible today. We don't have a definite timeframe but will let you know as soon as the database is available again. We'll also add a message about this to our home page.<br><br>Apologies for any inconvenience and thank you for bearing with us. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-30T10:15:57+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;88135833.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;9d8d047c.1407">   <title>Copac database move postponed </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;9d8d047c.1407</link>   <description> Hello<br><br>As you may have already seen, we have updated the Copac Web site, so the<br>information pages have had a refresh, but unfortunately we\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve run into a<br>problem with the database and search interface move. We\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve identified an<br>issue that may affect response times, so we are going to delay the move to<br>later in the week so we can resolve this before we complete the move. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-29T12:47:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Contributor Helpdesk</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;9d8d047c.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;f7c1eb10.1407">   <title>Copac downtime Tuesday 29th July </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;f7c1eb10.1407</link>   <description> Hello<br><br>The Copac service will be down for a short time on the morning of Tuesday<br>29th July as we move to the new Copac database. There will be a lot of<br>behind-the-scenes activity for some time, so the service should be<br>considered at risk all that morning. With apologies for any inconvenience<br>this causes you. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-28T08:47:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Contributor Helpdesk</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;f7c1eb10.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;3416355f.1407">   <title>Beta release - new Copac database and revised interface </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;3416355f.1407</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>A new Copac database and revised interface will be released shortly. You can try out the Beta interface http://beta.copac.ac.uk/search/ and give us feedback using the email links on most screens. (This is under active development so is subject to change without notice.)<br><br>More details about the developments can be found on the Copac Blog: http://copac.ac.uk/blog/2014/07/beta-interface-trial/ . [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-25T13:54:36+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;3416355f.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;928c09b5.1406">   <title>Copac update: Library of the Royal Academy of Arts loaded </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;928c09b5.1406</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>We're pleased to announce that the holdings of the Royal Academy of Arts Library http://www.royalacademy.org.uk/collections-and-research have been added to Copac.<br><br>The Royal Academy Library holds a comprehensive collection of books and exhibition catalogues on British art, artists and architects, with a particular concentration on the life and practice of past and present Members of the Royal Academy and the history of the institution, its exhibitions and collections. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-26T08:54:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;928c09b5.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;ad93e214.1404">   <title>Correction: National Library of Wales / Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru catalogue reload </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;ad93e214.1404</link>   <description> *Apologies, the previous email should have read:*<br><br>Dear all<br><br>As a result of a change in their local library system we are reloading the National Library of Wales / Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru catalogue. This means their records are gradually disappearing from your Copac search results and will start to reappear<br>shortly as the reload takes place. We've also posted this information on the Copac homepage. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-07T16:03:19+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;ad93e214.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;da410481.1404">   <title>National Library of Wales / Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru catalogue reload </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;da410481.1404</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>As a result of a change in their local library system we are reloading the National Library of Wales / Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru catalogue. This means their records are gradually disappearing from your Copac search results and will start to reappear<br>shortly as the reload takes place. We've also posted this information on the Copac homepage. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-07T15:48:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jane Ronson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COPAC;da410481.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
